Can you explain how the command `./verus -chain=VRSCTEST dcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":2,"amount":100}]'` will allow me to convert my VRSCTEST to GOLD at a 1:1 ratio?

The command you provided is not correct. The correct command to park a conversion of VRSCTEST to GOLD is `./verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'`. This will effectively park your conversion until the GOLD token launches, at which point, you will either find 0.975 GOLD in your wallet, or you will have your VRSCTEST back.
